de.scrubstudios.srvmon.director

Class Host

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.scrubstudios.srvmon.director.Host

  • public class Host
extends java.lang.Object
    Host class for the SRVMON DIRECTOR - UPDATER. Defines a single host. This class is used in an alrraylist.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pol Warnimont
